name: The legend of Mora
description:
Welcome to the Legend of Mora, a cute action adventure game where you will need to improve your skills on a daily basis in order to defeat the monsters that lie between you and Mora.

Controls: Mouse only. 

Made with Brackeys 2023 entry.

All art, audio and gameplay made from scratch within one week.

Tools used: Godot, GarageBand, sfxr, Aseprite
